languages.text: "Вы, посланцы Расколотого Неба, всегда так говорите, потому что боитесь того, кто знает истину".
"That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."
languages.original_text: "Вы, посланцы Расколотого Неба, всегда так говорите, потому что боитесь того, кто знает истину".

traits.locale_text: "It's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."
"It's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."
"That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."
"That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."
"That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."
"That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."

languages.text: «Eso es lo que dicen todos los emisarios del Cielo Desgarrado, porque teméis a quien conoce la verdad».
languages.original_text: "That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es lo que dicen todos los emisarios del Cielo Desgarrado, porque teméis a quien conoce la verdad».

languages.text: “你们破碎之空的使者总是这么说，因为你们惧怕那些看到真相的人。”
languages.original_text: "That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."

traits.locale_text: “你们破碎之空的使者总是这么说，因为你们惧怕那些看到真相的人。”

languages.text: 「それは、あんたたち割れた空の使者がいつも言うことだ。なぜなら、真実を知る者を恐れているからだ」
languages.original_text: "That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「それは、あんたたち割れた空の使者がいつも言うことだ。なぜなら、真実を知る者を恐れているからだ」

languages.text: « C'est ce que vous autres émissaires de la Fracture Céleste dites toujours, parce que vous ne craignez rien tant que ceux qui connaissent la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce que vous autres émissaires de la Fracture Céleste dites toujours, parce que vous ne craignez rien tant que ceux qui connaissent la vérité. »

languages.text: "Çatlak Gök'ün elçileri... Hepiniz aynı şeyi söylüyorsunuz çünkü gerçeği bilenden korkuyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Çatlak Gök'ün elçileri... Hepiniz aynı şeyi söylüyorsunuz çünkü gerçeği bilenden korkuyorsunuz."

languages.text: "Das sagt Ihr Abgesandten des Gespaltenen Himmels immer, weil Ihr Leute fürchtet, die die Wahrheit kennen."
languages.original_text: "That's what you emissaries of the Riven Sky always say, because you're afraid of one who knows the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Das sagt Ihr Abgesandten des Gespaltenen Himmels immer, weil Ihr Leute fürchtet, die die Wahrheit kennen."
